languages.text: "Ваш ручной ксенос... Ирлиэт, если не ошибаюсь, искала с вами встречи. Она посмела явить свой богомерзкий лик во дворце Вольного Торговца и отказывается покидать его, пока не переговорит с вами. Не берусь судить ксеносов, но эльдарка выглядела взволнованно — кажется, речь шла о каком-то корабле. Право, лучше вам лично обо всем ее расспросить".

traits.locale_text: "Ваш ручной ксенос... Ирлиэт, если не ошибаюсь, искала с вами встречи. Она посмела явить свой богомерзкий лик во дворце Вольного Торговца и отказывается покидать его, пока не переговорит с вами. Не берусь судить ксеносов, но эльдарка выглядела взволнованно — кажется, речь шла о каком-то корабле. Право, лучше вам лично обо всем ее расспросить".
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Your pet xenos... Yrliet, I believe, is seeking a meeting with you. She had the audacity to defile the Rogue Trader's palace with her profane presence and refuses to leave until she has spoken with you. I would never presume to be able to read the emotions of xenos, but the Aeldari appeared perturbed. I believe she mentioned a voidship of some sort. It may be best if she told you everything directly."
languages.original_text: "Ваш ручной ксенос... Ирлиэт, если не ошибаюсь, искала с вами встречи. Не берусь судить ксеносов, но эльдарка выглядела взволнованно — кажется, речь шла о каком-то корабле. Право, лучше вам лично обо всем ее расспросить".

She had the audacity to defile the Rogue Trader's palace with her profane presence and refuses to leave until she has spoken with you. I would never presume to be able to read the emotions of xenos, but the Aeldari appeared perturbed. I believe she mentioned a voidship of some sort. It may be best if she told you everything directly."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: « Votre compagne xénos... Yrliet, si je ne m'abuse, souhaite vous parler. Elle a l'audace de souiller le palais {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} de sa présence impie et refuse de partir tant qu'elle ne sera pas entretenue avec vous. Loin de moi la prétention de pouvoir lire les émotions des xénos, mais l'Aeldari semblait préoccupée. Je crois qu'elle a parlé d'un croiseur stellaire. Mais il serait peut-être préférable qu'elle vous explique directement. »
languages.original_text: "Your pet xenos... Yrliet, I believe, is seeking a meeting with you. She had the audacity to defile the Rogue Trader's palace with her profane presence and refuses to leave until she has spoken with you. I would never presume to be able to read the emotions of xenos, but the Aeldari appeared perturbed. I believe she mentioned a voidship of some sort. It may be best if she told you everything directly."

traits.locale_text: « Votre compagne xénos... Yrliet, si je ne m'abuse, souhaite vous parler. Elle a l'audace de souiller le palais {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} de sa présence impie et refuse de partir tant qu'elle ne sera pas entretenue avec vous. Loin de moi la prétention de pouvoir lire les émotions des xénos, mais l'Aeldari semblait préoccupée. Je crois qu'elle a parlé d'un croiseur stellaire. Mais il serait peut-être préférable qu'elle vous explique directement. »
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: “你的异形宠物……伊莉耶特，应该是打算与您见一面。这个厚颜无耻的异形竟敢玷污行商浪人的宫殿，而且声称在与您谈话之前绝不会离开。我不太擅长理解异形的情绪，但那位艾达灵族看起来似乎相当不安，似乎隐约提到了虚空舰之类的事情。详细情况或许由她亲口告诉您会比较好。”
languages.original_text: "Your pet xenos... Yrliet, I believe, is seeking a meeting with you. She had the audacity to defile the Rogue Trader's palace with her profane presence and refuses to leave until she has spoken with you. I would never presume to be able to read the emotions of xenos, but the Aeldari appeared perturbed. I believe she mentioned a voidship of some sort. It may be best if she told you everything directly."

traits.locale_text: “你的异形宠物……伊莉耶特，应该是打算与您见一面。这个厚颜无耻的异形竟敢玷污行商浪人的宫殿，而且声称在与您谈话之前绝不会离开。我不太擅长理解异形的情绪，但那位艾达灵族看起来似乎相当不安，似乎隐约提到了虚空舰之类的事情。详细情况或许由她亲口告诉您会比较好。”
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: 「あなたのお気に入りの異種族…ユリエットでしたか。彼女があなたとの面会を求めています。あの下卑た存在感で自由開拓者殿の宮殿をずうずうしくも汚しておきながら、あなたと話すまで帰らないと言っているようです。私には異種族の感情を読み取ることなどできそうにはありませんが、あのアエルダリは動揺しているようでした。彼女は何かのヴォイドシップについて話していたようです。彼女から直接聞いた方がいいでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Your pet xenos... Yrliet, I believe, is seeking a meeting with you. She had the audacity to defile the Rogue Trader's palace with her profane presence and refuses to leave until she has spoken with you. I would never presume to be able to read the emotions of xenos, but the Aeldari appeared perturbed. I believe she mentioned a voidship of some sort. It may be best if she told you everything directly."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたのお気に入りの異種族…ユリエットでしたか。彼女があなたとの面会を求めています。あの下卑た存在感で自由開拓者殿の宮殿をずうずうしくも汚しておきながら、あなたと話すまで帰らないと言っているようです。私には異種族の感情を読み取ることなどできそうにはありませんが、あのアエルダリは動揺しているようでした。彼女は何かのヴォイドシップについて話していたようです。彼女から直接聞いた方がいいでしょう」
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Eure Xenos-Ergebene ... Yrliet heißt sie, glaube ich, möchte sich mit Euch treffen. Sie besaß die Dreistigkeit, den Palast {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} mit ihrer gottlosen Anwesenheit zu schänden und weigert sich zu gehen, bevor sie nicht mit Euch gesprochen hat. Ich würde mir ja niemals anmaßen, die Emotionen von Xenos begreifen zu können, aber die Aeldari wirkte äußerst nervös. Ich glaube, sie erwähnte auch eine Art Raumschiff. Es wäre wohl besser, wenn sie Euch persönlich davon berichten könnte."
languages.original_text: "Your pet xenos... Yrliet, I believe, is seeking a meeting with you. She had the audacity to defile the Rogue Trader's palace with her profane presence and refuses to leave until she has spoken with you. I would never presume to be able to read the emotions of xenos, but the Aeldari appeared perturbed. I believe she mentioned a voidship of some sort. It may be best if she told you everything directly."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Xenos-Ergebene ... Yrliet heißt sie, glaube ich, möchte sich mit Euch treffen. Sie besaß die Dreistigkeit, den Palast {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} mit ihrer gottlosen Anwesenheit zu schänden und weigert sich zu gehen, bevor sie nicht mit Euch gesprochen hat. Ich würde mir ja niemals anmaßen, die Emotionen von Xenos begreifen zu können, aber die Aeldari wirkte äußerst nervös. Ich glaube, sie erwähnte auch eine Art Raumschiff. Es wäre wohl besser, wenn sie Euch persönlich davon berichten könnte."
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: «Su mascota xenos... Yrliet, creo que se llama, desea reunirse con usted. Ha tenido la osadía de profanar el palacio {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente con su impía presencia, y no piensa marcharse sin hablar con usted. No soy la persona indicada para discernir las emociones de una xenos, pero la Aeldari parece intranquila. Creo que ha mencionado algún tipo de nave del vacío. Quizá sea mejor que se lo cuente ella todo directamente».
languages.original_text: "Your pet xenos... Yrliet, I believe, is seeking a meeting with you. She had the audacity to defile the Rogue Trader's palace with her profane presence and refuses to leave until she has spoken with you. I would never presume to be able to read the emotions of xenos, but the Aeldari appeared perturbed. I believe she mentioned a voidship of some sort. It may be best if she told you everything directly."

traits.locale_text: «Su mascota xenos... Yrliet, creo que se llama, desea reunirse con usted. Ha tenido la osadía de profanar el palacio {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente con su impía presencia, y no piensa marcharse sin hablar con usted. No soy la persona indicada para discernir las emociones de una xenos, pero la Aeldari parece intranquila. Creo que ha mencionado algún tipo de nave del vacío. Quizá sea mejor que se lo cuente ella todo directamente».
traits.speaker: Clemence

languages.text: "Evcil zenonuz... Yrliet'ti sanıyorum, kendisi sizinle görüşmek istiyor. Din dışı varlığıyla Hür Tacir'in sarayını kirletme cüretini gösterdi ve sizinle konuşmadan burayı terk etmeyi de reddediyor. Zenoların duygularını okuyabildiğim iddiasında asla bulunamam ancak Aeldari, kaygılı görünüyordu. Sanıyorum bir çeşit uçsuz gemisinden söz ediyordu. Her şeyi size kendisinin anlatması daha iyi olabilir."
languages.original_text: "Your pet xenos... Yrliet, I believe, is seeking a meeting with you. She had the audacity to defile the Rogue Trader's palace with her profane presence and refuses to leave until she has spoken with you. I would never presume to be able to read the emotions of xenos, but the Aeldari appeared perturbed. I believe she mentioned a voidship of some sort. It may be best if she told you everything directly."

traits.locale_text: "Evcil zenonuz, sanıyorum ismi Yrliet idi, sizinle görüşmek istiyor. Din dışı varlığıyla Hür Tacir'in sarayını kirletme cüretini gösterdi ve sizinle konuşmadan burayı terk etmeyi de reddediyor. Zenoların duygularını okuyabildiğim iddiasında asla bulunamam ancak Aeldari kaygılı görünüyordu. Sanıyorum bir çeşit bir uçsuz gemisinden söz ediyordu. Her şeyi size kendisi anlatsa daha iyi olabilir."
traits.speaker: Clemence
